Lightning Clutch.name: Lightning Clutch
Lightning Clutch.flavor: Tendrils of lightning course from your hand into your blade, linking you and your foe. For the rest of the battle, your enemy must beware your aegis.
Lightning Clutch.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and you can use your aegis of assault power on the target of the attack as a free action. The target remains marked by your aegis of assault for the rest of the encounter, even if you use that power against a new target. It is still superseded by other marking effects.

Stance of Chaos.name: Stance of Chaos
Stance of Chaos.flavor: You invoke the fury of elemental chaos, attacking wildly. Frost, fire, or lightning dances along your blade as you lunge at your foes.
keywords: Arcane, Stance, Weapon ; Cold, Fire or Lightning
Stance of Chaos.effect: Until the stance ends, you take a â€“2 penalty to attack rolls but your weapon attacks deal an extra 1d12 cold, fire, or lightning damage (your choice). You can end this stance with a minor action.

Shyran Cataclysm.name: Shyran Cataclysm
Shyran Cataclysm.flavor: You slice a rift between the planes. An elemental maelstrom explodes from the rift, searing and burning all in its path.
keywords: Acid, Arcane, Cold, Fire, Implement, Lightning, Thunder
Shyran Cataclysm.onHit: 5d8 + Intelligence modifier acid, cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage.
Shyran Cataclysm.onMiss: Half damage. Choose one damage type for the half damage: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.
